front.title: A Multilink Protocol for Synchronizing the Transmission of Multi-protocol Datagrams.

abstract.t: This document proposes a method for splitting and recombining datagrams across multiple logical data links. Such facilities are desirable to exploit the potential for increased bandwidth offered by multiple bearer channels in ISDN, yet to do so in such away that minimizes reordering of packets. This is accomplished by means of new PPP options and protocols. This draft incorporates comments arising at the 27th IETF meeting in Amsterdam.
